text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab tum nashey ki halat mein ho to namaz ke qareeb na jao, namaz us waqt padhni chahiye jab tum jaano ke kya keh rahey ho, aur isi tarah janabat ki halat mein bhi namaz ke qareeb na jao jab tak ke ghusl na karlo, illa yeh ke raaste se guzarte ho. Aur agar kabhi aisa ho ke tum bimar ho, ya safar mein ho, ya tum mein se koi shaks rafey hajat karke aaye, ya tumne auraton se lams (intimate relation) kiya ho, aur phir pani na miley to paak mitti se kaam lo aur issey apne chehron aur haathon par masaah karlo. Beshak Allah narmi se kaam lene wala aur bakshish farmane wala hai
